actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class charts.AlarmsDialog
Handles the action events triggered by the user clicking on the "Add", "Delete" and "Ok" buttons in this dialog.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class charts.ChartModel
Handles events generated by the timer that fires when one instance of the currently selected interval is over.

Handles user interactions with the "Add", "Delete" and "OK" buttons of the dialog.

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class main.MainController
Handles events from the user interacting with the "Preferences", "Stock Finder", "Watchlist" and "Exit" buttons on the main menu bar, as well as the buttons within the watchlist frame and the stock finder.

Handles events generated by the user clicking on the "Add", "Delete", "Edit" "To Top", "Save and Close" and "Cancel" buttons in the preferences Dialog.

Handles events generated by the user clicking on the "Search" and "Close" buttons.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class watchlist.WatchlistModel
Handles the events fired by each stocks timer and resets change direction and therefore price cell render color.

Alarm - Class in charts
Represents an alarm price.
Alarm(Stock, double) - Constructor for class charts.Alarm
Creates a new alarm price and deducts whether it is an upper or a lower bound.
AlarmsDialog - Class in charts
Alarms Dialogs can be opened by the user from the menu bar of a chart frame.
AlarmsDialog(ChartPanel, Stock) - Constructor for class charts.AlarmsDialog
Creates an alarms dialog.
alarmType - Variable in class charts.Alarm
The alarm type.
AlarmType - Enum in charts
This enum type is used in the Alarm class to define whether an alarm threshold price is a lower or an upper bound, in order to decide whether it is to be triggered when the stock price crosses from below or from above.
ApplicationPreferencesModel - Class in preferences
An instance of this class stores the application preferences, the stocks in the watchlist and the opened chart frames.
ApplicationPreferencesModel() - Constructor for class preferences.ApplicationPreferencesModel
